mdRecord.dcterms:title: Salem Fire Department Excavating in a Neighborhood
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Roll of color photographs, some photographs show blackened dirt near a residential area, some showing fire fighters near a barrel or drum and some boxes and bottles, some show the fire fighters near construction equipment, some with an accident on the road, some near a construction mishap which burst a container of liquid, and some show the fire fighters near their fire engine trucks, all of the photos are undated
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
